lenders.name: Liliane Emma Lesley
lenders.loan_because:
We want to be kind to people. (Emma - on the left)
We want to help people around the world. (Lesley - on the right)
We are inspired by people who act on their dreams,  we love learning about others around the world and we recognize that, by comparison with others, we have so much, so it's good to share. (Liliane, writer & mum)
- ELL Banco!
lenders.occupational_info:
We (Emma and Lesley) are 13 year old home educating twins who love gymnastics!
I (Liliane) am a writer and speaker. My book, The Mastery Club - See the Invisible, Hear the Silent, Do the Impossible, is about young people who take responsibility for achieving their goals and making their dreams come true!

lenders.name: Keith

lenders.name: Jordan

lenders.name: Fiona
lenders.loan_because: I believe we need to think globally in terms of economy and help everyone succeed in their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a world filled with beauty and do everything I can to share that.

lenders.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in my life and I would like to help others help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
"Behold, I am making all things new" - Jesus Christ

"He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done." Prov 19:17

lenders.name: Richard & Bethany
lenders.loan_because:
You know that saying "Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach him how to fish and he will eat for a lifetime"? Kiva operates on a similar principal. We could donate to a charity that hands out food or clothing, but isn't it better to give money to help support the growth of a person's business -- the source of her income -- so she can buy her own food and clothing? We liked that idea and felt our gift would have a bigger impact on an individual life through Kiva.

We chose to support Maria because we have traveled through Central America, know the poor conditions that many people live in there, and wanted to help a woman with a family. We hope her business is successful!
lenders.occupational_info: Richard is a police officer, and Bethany is director of communications for a foundation that strives for patient safety in hospitals.

lenders.name: Josephine
lenders.loan_because: it is such a direct way to help others do what they want in their lives

lenders.name: Michael and Martha

lenders.occupational_info: Michael works at a local bank; Martha teaches writing at a community college.

lenders.loan_because: Seems to be a good way to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain and repair equipment in a factory enviroment.

lenders.name: Lucy

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to have been born into a well-to-do country and would like to help others who are not so fortunate.

lenders.name: One Perfect You.com
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help people make a better life for themselfs
lenders.occupational_info: I run a website that aims to help people build their self-confidence and self-esteem so that they can live happier and fuller lives.

lenders.name: Bronwyn
lenders.loan_because:
everyone should pay it forward and keep the good flowing. 
xoxo

lenders.name: Kathleen & Greg
lenders.loan_because: We hope to help, in a small way, people who are working hard to look after their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a printing company. We print letterheads, business cards, invoice books - things like that.

lenders.name: Daniele
lenders.loan_because: It's a simple way to keep lit a candle of light... helping those who help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people in distributing their savings/financial resources in products  and across their lifespan so that they can enjoy life and its gifts with less concerns... a way of helping dreams come true, making plans and acting coherently day by day.

lenders.name: SMATS Group
lenders.loan_because: It is important to help out those who need it the most and share in the good fortune that we all take for granted too much these days.
lenders.occupational_info:
Australian Taxation & Finance Experts helping expats, investors and intended migrants to Australia.

We host many free seminars around the world each year, and at each event collect donations for Kiva and other charities under the slogan "help others as we have tried to help you".

We hope that this allows us to indeed help as many people as possible and greatly appreciate the efforts of Kiva that allows us to so easily find the people most in need of a helping hand.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's right.
lenders.occupational_info: I write stories in many languages that never talk back to me.

lenders.name: Linda & Rune
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: It helps people become more independent and self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I use to lend funds to large companies.  I enjoy lending through Kiva even more.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: We're all part of a global community. People shouldn't be condemned to a life of poverty by circumstance.

lenders.name: Creo Mundi
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it is the right thing to do. Helping someone build a business will in the long run be more sustainable than just giving handouts.
lenders.occupational_info: We are all about positive energy, and changing the way people think about themselves one body at a time.

lenders.name: Aman
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a designer/developer.

lenders.name: Ola Johansson
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Web analyst

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.occupational_info: I am a chemical engineer, working towards the completion of my PhD.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: Everything matters. I want to be part of a sustainable future by supporting community through small businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at ACCION- a microlender that provides loan to small business owners in the United States.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: My Darling Daughter introduced me to Kiva and provided me with $25 to donate to My Personal chosen recipient.
lenders.occupational_info: I live in South Africa and do not work out of the home now. I do some sewing for charity.

lenders.name: The Photobooth Company
lenders.loan_because: We love to help other businesses succeed
lenders.occupational_info:
We build and rent out photobooths for wedding receptions, and other parties.

It's a machine that takes 4 candid pictures in a row, and then prints them out in a photostrip to take home.

lenders.name: Marion
lenders.occupational_info: I'm dealing with foreign exchange

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: To help another person is to create a place for God.

lenders.name: Gur
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: "That which you do for the least of these, you do for Me."

lenders.name: Kiran
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in somebody's life.

lenders.name: Markus
lenders.loan_because: I was always lucky in making money, I became rich young and easily, I think everybody deserves a good life.
lenders.occupational_info: ex police officer, stock market day trader with a lot of spare time.

lenders.name: Steve & Krista
lenders.loan_because: our mothers taught us "to share".
lenders.occupational_info:
Steve is a fellow entrepreneur and owns his own gym.
Krista works as a Communications Manager for a Non-Profit organization.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I believe the purpose of life is to be happy. The simplest path to happiness is kindness and service to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate groups at a residential drug and alcohol treatment center. Besides the traditional groups like recovery dynamics and relapse prevention I also teach mindfulness and meditation. In another program, I provide one-on-one training to other alcoholics and addicts. My avocation is animal rescue.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I would like others in the world to see Americans as individuals concerned about and connected to them as individuals. Just read "Three Cups of Tea", how inspiring!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science to teenagers in a small urban high school. I also have a farm with horses, hay, ponds and forest so I work hard there as well.

lenders.name: Huguette & Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is a very normal and human thing to do. It is a soft impulse from the Heart.
lenders.occupational_info: Here in Canada, we have 2 main languages: English and French. I , Huguette, make sure we understand each other. And Lorraine makes sure every one feels good.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I work hard to look after my family, and would like to help other people who are just doing the same thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I help prepare books and other materials for publication.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve their station in life, ease life's journey.
lenders.occupational_info: am now disabled.  Was a nurse for many years, worked hard loved much,  eased other's suffereing.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I respect someone's will to start their own business and would like to do what I can to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I program computers to help people get work done and communicate with one another.

lenders.name: Nick Throlson
lenders.loan_because: It gives me good feeling & in order for me to be a success. I must help others just makes me who I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I am Nick Throlson based out of Southern California. I make money online through different methods. Primarily, I am a performance marketer and drive traffic to several different sites I operate. I utilize SEO and PPC to bring traffic to my websites. My blog will discuss several different topics. The main purpose of this blog will be to cover different tools and methods I utilize to make money online!

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to design and take care of computer networks at a University. Now I'm retired and help take care of my granddaughters.

lenders.name: 441 NW
lenders.loan_because: we believe in microfinance!!
lenders.occupational_info: We are four friends who help run businesses, produce interactive projects and write. We hosted a Pangea Day viewing in Seattle where we accepted donations to invest through KIVA. We look forward to maintaining these investments for years to come as they circle the globe.

lenders.name: Kathy Ellen
lenders.loan_because: loaning is a good way to spend money. I think too many people are more concerned on how much money they make and not as concerned as they should be about how that money is spent. I want to make a difference in the world, so why can't my money?
lenders.occupational_info:
I go into schools and do presentations on history for 4th, 5th, and 6th graders. They get to interact a lot so it's a fun time for them.

I am going to school to be a Waldorf Teacher! Hooray! In addition, I like to speak French, make anything I can, ride bikes, walk on a slackline, manage my money, and make wooden toys.

lenders.name: Nabila
lenders.loan_because: I'm a firm believer in giving everyone a level and equal opportunity to empower themselves so that poverty is not handed down to the next generation.

lenders.name: Kellie
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to provide for themselves and their families~to be able to go to a stable home after a honest days work and feel peace.
lenders.occupational_info:
I take in videos from all over the world of news events and get them ready to be viewed on a global news network.
I also volunteer with an animal shelter and take care of cats with AIDS.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: It takes a village...in more ways than one.

lenders.name: Mike & Monica
lenders.loan_because: Running a business requires cash.  Micro-financing is a great way to get this needed cash to these entrepreneurs. Kudos to Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a library. The world's first great democratizing institution.  And now, the Internet and Kiva.  Two more great democratizing institutions!

lenders.name: Seth
lenders.occupational_info: I work with technology in education.

lenders.name: Darla
lenders.loan_because: I feel connected to other people in the world that are taking positive action in their own lives. It inspires me to do the same in my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in technology, own an online company and am interested in technology that helps improve people's lives.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: To empower people to help themselves

lenders.name: Zoie
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky. I've been able to work and care for my family, but if I was born in other parts of the world, it might not be the case.
lenders.occupational_info: Stay at home mom/newbie farmer

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: many people have helped me along the way in life so I'd like to return the favor.

lenders.name: Romell
lenders.loan_because: I want to help empower people to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I saw the chance to help out people who want to better their lives.

lenders.name: Dylan Ferreira
lenders.loan_because: People deserve every chance at a good life.  Kiva provides a wonderful opportunity for people to connect and work together.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a systems administrator for an email provider.

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out the less fortunate. I am a entrepreneur at heart, and love to see an organization helping out people who are making a difference in their community.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is numbers, numbers, and more numbers, which I love but do not have the passion for that I used to.

lenders.name: Patz
lenders.loan_because: 100% of my donation goes directly to the entrepreneur, and because so little from me means sooo much to them.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: When I think of the foolish things I've spent $25 dollars on in my life, it feels good to know that at least these $25 are making a legitimate difference.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I believe that together we can make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science to 14-18 year olds at a public high school in Colorado Springs.

lenders.name: Envato
lenders.loan_because: On October 15th 2007 Collis Ta'eed, the founder of Envato, kicked off Blog Action Day as an annual event to persuade the world's blogs to discuss a single topic in hopes of inciting positive changes in the world.   In 2008, the second annual Blog Action Day, focused on poverty. We invite bloggers everywhere to blog about poverty and encouraged donations through Kiva to help eliminate global poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Envato started in 2006 with a simple idea - make awesome websites! Today we operate Marketplaces, Communities, Blogs & Educational Sites. Our sites reach hundreds of thousands of visitors everyday and are well loved around the world.

lenders.name: Elliot
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed by God with financial well-being, and I want to thank Him by sharing it.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and make software for computers and Internet web sites.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I want to support other women

lenders.name: Elyse
lenders.loan_because: I have been very sick for a year now and I am starting to finally get well again which has made me realize how much I want to help others and give as much as I can to enrich their lives.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: This is one way to change the world. If you try, you will catch on.
lenders.occupational_info: Working in the Internets - where the time is always right to do right.

lenders.name: Albert
lenders.loan_because: I can give and really I am grateful for what I have and did in my life so far
lenders.occupational_info: Working with metals to make something useful

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.occupation: Database Programmer / Analyst at Macalester College
lenders.loan_because: My focus is lending to women who provide sewing and tailoring services. I worked as a theatrical costumer for many years and have a great appreciation of international clothing and fabrics. My favorite part of being a Kiva lender is seeing the photos in my portfolio of so many women from around the world surrounded by their fabric and sewing machines. It's great to know I have been able to lend a helping hand.

lenders.name: endang
lenders.loan_because: My mother loaned to a lot of people in needs too. We lived in South East Asia.
lenders.occupational_info: Secretary in an electronic repair shop in New York. My frugal life experience back in Asia helped  me to survive in this expensive city. Please tell your children to learn English (and Mandarin) so that they can live and work anywhere in this world.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a history teacher.

lenders.name: Yum Yum
lenders.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is required.

lenders.name: Tiffany and Jeff
lenders.loan_because: we all get by with a little help from our friends.

lenders.name: Parametrix
lenders.loan_because: The Core Values of our firm are Integrity, Compassion, Collaboration, Employee Ownership, Client Service, and Fun.  Lending to other entrepreneurs fits who we are.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an engineering and environmental science consulting firm with offices in the Western U.S.  Our business lines include Community Building, Environmental Engineering & Sciences, Natural Resources, Transportation, and Water Solutions.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I am so fortunate in health and financial means.  I feel that sharing with people who want to help themselves is important.  As an entrepreneur, I know how important small loans are in moving your business forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise small businesses on promoting their services or products to new customers and how to maintain existing customers.

lenders.name: Avani Creations Inc.
lenders.loan_because: this system works and it take the whole world to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small entrepreneur who is constantly exploring opportunities to work within my own community.  To improve the quality of life for all of us and also promote ethical and fair trade practices.
